content: {"name": "ICNA Relief USA Programs Inc.", "alternate_name": "", "description": "We do offer other services on a case by case basis including the following; Health Services, Refugee Services, Disaster Relief Services, Women's Transitional Housing, Back2School, Foster Advocacy Training & Education, and Muslim Family Services.
